title: S8E19 – "From Above and Below" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Grant Hinton, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about deadly documents, alien arthropods, hellish hackneys, and paranormal playlists.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
